Name: Dosis
Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 240.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170

Name: Diagnosis
Description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 450

Name: Kardia
Description: Grants self the effect of Kardia and a selected party member or self the effect of Kardion, restoring HP after casting certain magic attacks.

Name: Prognosis
Description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 300

Name: Egeiro
Description: Resurrects target to a weakened state.

Name: Physis
Description:
Gradually restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 100
Duration: 21s

Name: Phlegma
Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 360 for the first enemy, and 30% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170
Maximum Charges: 2
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

Name: Eukrasia
Description:
Augments certain offensive and healing magic actions.
Dosis III is upgraded to Eukrasian Dosis III.
Diagnosis is upgraded to Eukrasian Diagnosis.
Prognosis is upgraded to Eukrasian Prognosis.

Name: Eukrasian Dosis
Description:
Deals unaspected damage over time.
Potency: 30
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170

* This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Name: Eukrasian Diagnosis
Description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 300
Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling to 180% of the amount of HP restored. When critical HP is restored, also grants Differential Diagnosis, nullifying damage equaling 180% the amount of HP restored.
Duration: 30s
Effect cannot be stacked with Eukrasian Prognosis or scholar's Galvanize.

* This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Name: Eukrasian Prognosis
Description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 100
Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling to 320% of the amount of HP restored.
Duration: 30s
Effect cannot be stacked with Eukrasian Diagnosis or scholar's Galvanize.

* This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

Name: Soteria
Description:
Doubles the cure potency of Kardion effects granted by you.
Duration: 10s

Name: Icarus
Description:
Rush to a target enemy's or party member's location.
Unable to cast if bound.

Name: Druochole
Description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 600
Additional Effect: Restores 5% of maximum MP
Addersgall Cost: 1

Name: Dyskrasia
Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 160 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170

Name: Kerachole
Description:
Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%.
Duration: 15s
Effect cannot be stacked with Taurochole.
Additional Effect: Regen
Cure Potency: 100
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Restores 5% of maximum MP
Addersgall Cost: 1

Name: Ixochole
Description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 400
Additional Effect: Restores 5% of maximum MP
Addersgall Cost: 1

Name: Zoe
Description:
Doubles the amount cured by your next healing spell.
Duration: 30s

Name: Pepsis
Description:
Restores own HP and the HP of nearby party members by removing Eukrasian Diagnosis and Eukrasian Prognosis effects granted by you.
Eukrasian Diagnosis Cure Potency: 450
Eukrasian Prognosis Cure Potency: 350
Targets not under the effect of Eukrasian Diagnosis or Eukrasian Prognosis will not be healed.

Name: Physis II
Description:
Gradually restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 100
Additional Effect: Increases HP recovered by healing magic by 10%
Duration: 15s

Name: Taurochole
Description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 600
Additional Effect: Reduces target's damage taken by 10%
Duration: 15s
Effect cannot be stacked with Kerachole.
Additional Effect: Restores 5% of maximum MP
Addersgall Cost: 1

Name: Toxikon
Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 320 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to target under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170
Addersting Cost: 1

Name: Haima
Description:
Creates a barrier around self or target party member that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 150 potency.
Additional Effect: Grants 5 stacks of Haimatinon
Duration: 30s
When the barrier is completely absorbed, a stack of Haimatinon is consumed and a new barrier is applied. When the effect duration expires, a healing effect is then applied.
Cure Potency: 150 per remaining stack of Haimatinon
Effect cannot be stacked with that of Panhaima.

Name: Dosis II
Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 320.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170

Potency: 60
Duration: 30s

Description:

Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170
Maximum Charges: 2

Name: Rizomata
Description: Grants 1 stack of Addersgall.

Name: Holos
Description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 300

Name: Panhaima
Description:
Erects a magicked barrier around self and all party members near you that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 150 potency.
Additional Effect: Grants 5 stacks of Panhaimatinon
Duration: 30s
When the barrier is completely absorbed, a stack of Panhaimatinon is consumed and a new barrier is applied.
When the effect duration expires, a healing effect is then applied.
Cure Potency: 150 per remaining stack of Panhaimatinon
Effect cannot be stacked with that of Haima.

Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 330.
Additional Effect: Restores HP to targets under the effect of Kardion granted by you

Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 170 to all nearby enemies.

Name: Krasis
Description:
Increases HP recovery via healing actions for a party member or self by 20%.
Duration: 10s

Name: Pneuma
Description:
Deals unaspected damage to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 330 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members, and reduces damage taken by 10%
Cure Potency: 400
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Restores HP to target under the effect of Kardion granted by you
Cure Potency: 170
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
